gui.talkiewalkiemod.label: Walkie-Talkie
advancement.talkiewalkiemod.root.title: Walkie Talkie
advancement.talkiewalkiemod.root.descrip: Discover the power of communication with the walkie-talkie.
advancement.talkiewalkiemod.wooden_talki: Obtained a wooden walkie-talkie, allowing you to communicate over short distances.
advancement.talkiewalkiemod.stone_talkie: Obtained a stone walkie-talkie, allowing for greater communication range.
advancement.talkiewalkiemod.iron_talkiew: Obtained an iron walkie-talkie, increasing communication range even further.
advancement.talkiewalkiemod.diamond_talk: Obtained a top-of-the-line diamond walkie-talkie, allowing for seamless communication over great distances.
advancement.talkiewalkiemod.netherite_ta: Obtained a state-of-the-art Netherite walkie-talkie, providing unprecedented communication range.
